alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 12:11AM MDT until July 04 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT/145 AM CDT/ FOR HAAKON...NORTHWESTERN MELLETTE AND NORTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 1209 AM MDT/109 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Billsburg to 3 miles west of Bunker to 8 miles west of Okaton, moving northeast at 20 mph. Automated observations have recently detected wind gusts around 60 mph 3 miles east of Philip and 9 miles east-northeast of Belvidere. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated observations. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kirley. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 143 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms may occur after the strongest storms pass. Remain sheltered inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows through the duration of the warning.
